title: Luxury 1 bed 1 bath Reduced Rate!
posting_body: This 1 Bed 1 Bath is a spacious floor plan with a very large closet in the bedroom, a large hallway closet, and an in-suite washer and dryer.
This suite also has granite countertops, maple cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and large floor to ceiling windows.
We have attached covered parking for $165 per month, also the Healthline is right outside our door so you may never need parking.
Access to the full 24/7 multi-level on-site gym with a reduced rate for residents.
We have two great restaurants in the building that offer convenience to our residents, as well as a free business center, weekly paper shredding service and dry cleaning self-service lockers.
Schedule your tour to see our suites today!
Mon, Wed, Fri - 9am-5:30pm, Tues, Thurs - 9am-6pm, Sat - 10am-3:30p
